workflow.name: Shopify & WooCommerce inventory sync with Google Sheets alerts
workflow.description:
## How It Works
A webhook or timer triggers the workflow to automatically fetch inventory data from multiple platforms. Stock levels are compared across stores to identify discrepancies, and any inconsistencies are updated on the respective platforms in real time. All changes and updates are recorded in Google Sheets for easy tracking, and email alerts are sent to notify relevant team members of any exceptions or issues that require attention. This ensures inventory accuracy and timely response to stock mismatches.

## Setup Steps
1. Add Shopify and/or WooCommerce API credentials to enable secure data access.
2. Connect Google Sheets for comprehensive logging of all inventory updates and Gmail for sending timely email alerts.
3. Configure the sync frequency within the Function nodes to control how often inventory data is fetched, compared, and updated.

## Prerequisites
- Shopify/WooCommerce API keys
- Google Sheets access
- Gmail credentials
- n8n instance
- 
## Customization
- Add ERPNext or custom APIs
- Enable Slack notifications
- AI discrepancy detection

## Benefits
- Real-time inventory accuracy
- Automated cross-platform updates
- Centralized audit logging

parameters.content:
## How It Works
A webhook or timer triggers the workflow to automatically fetch inventory data from multiple platforms. Stock levels are compared across stores to identify discrepancies, and any inconsistencies are updated on the respective platforms in real time. All changes and updates are recorded in Google Sheets for easy tracking, and email alerts are sent to notify relevant team members of any exceptions or issues that require attention. This ensures inventory accuracy and timely response to stock mismatches.

## Setup Instructions
1. Add Shopify/WooCommerce API credentials.
2. Link Google Sheets and Gmail.
3. Adjust sync frequency in Function nodes.

## Prerequisites
- Shopify/WooCommerce API keys
- Google Sheets access
- Gmail credentials
- n8n instance

## Customization
- Add ERPNext or custom APIs
- Enable Slack notifications
- AI discrepancy detection

## Benefits
- Real-time inventory accuracy
- Automated cross-platform updates

## Setup Steps
1. Add Shopify and/or WooCommerce API credentials to enable secure data access.
2. Connect Google Sheets for comprehensive logging of all inventory updates and Gmail for sending timely email alerts.
3. Configure the sync frequency within the Function nodes to control how often inventory data is fetched, compared, and updated.

## Data Collection
Fetches current inventory from Shopify and WooCommerce APIs, then normalizes product data into a consistent format for comparison.

## Discrepancy Detection
Compares stock levels by SKU across platforms. Flags mismatches and determines which platform has the authoritative count.

## Platform Updates
Pushes corrected inventory values back to Shopify and WooCommerce to maintain sync across both stores.

## Logging & Alerts
Records all sync operations to Google Sheets with timestamps. Sends email notifications for discrepancies or sync failures.

## Error Handling
Catches API failures, connection issues, or data format problems. Ensures partial failures don't break the entire sync process.

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
